goodLuck.description: The player can ask for a hint on one of their questions this round.

goodLuck.effect: Double the Points of Your Next Correct Answer!
goodLuck.description: If the player answers their next question correctly, they receive double the points.
The player can skip one question of their choice without penalty.
The player takes another turn immediately after this one.

goodLuck.effect: Steal Points Half an Opponents Points!
goodLuck.description: The player takes 50 points from a randomly selected opponent.

badLuck.description: The player loses a quarter of their current score.

badLuck.effect: Miss a Turn and Lose 20 Points!
badLuck.description: The player skips a turn and loses 20 points.

badLuck.effect: Switch Points with the Lowest-Scoring Player!
badLuck.description: The player switches their score with the player who has the lowest score.
The next player chooses the category for the affected player’s next turn.

badLuck.effect: Reveal a Random Answer to All Players!
badLuck.description: A random question’s answer is shown to all players.
